HipsLyingIliotibial.name: Lying Iliotibial Stretch
HipsLyingIliotibial.preparation: Lie on one side. Position ankle of lower leg over outside of upper thigh. Grasp top ankle or forefoot behind. Reposition side of upper body on floor.
HipsLyingIliotibial.execution: Pull knee of rear leg back by straightening hip. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.

HipsSquattingIliotibial.name: Squatting Iliotibial Stretch
HipsSquattingIliotibial.preparation: Stand with feet together and side toward wall, arms length away. Place hand on wall and opposite hand on hip.
HipsSquattingIliotibial.execution: Squat with supporting leg while placing leg nearest wall behind and across supporting leg so foot is positioned away from wall. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
HipsSquattingIliotibial.comments: Keep hip of straight leg extended by leaning pelvis slightly forward.

HipsStandingIliotibial.name: Standing Iliotibial Stretch
HipsStandingIliotibial.preparation: Stand erect with legs crossed, outsides of feet together.
HipsStandingIliotibial.execution: Maintaining complete extension of hip, shift body weight to rear leg allowing hip of leg in front to drop. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.

HipsWallIliotibial.name: Wall Iliotibial Stretch
HipsWallIliotibial.preparation: Stand with feet together and side toward wall, slightly greater than arms length away. Place closest hand on wall and opposite hand on hip.
HipsWallIliotibial.execution: With legs and hip straight, lower hip toward wall. Hold stretch . Repeat with opposite side.
HipsWallIliotibial.comments: Keep hip extended by leaning pelvis slightly forward and contracting Gluteus Maximus.
